short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides AI-powered data analysis tools to assist with data-driven decision making. Part of DataHeat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Data Assistant refers to an artificial intelligence-powered tool or system that helps digital marketers and data specialists with tasks related to data management, analysis, and processing. It can provide insights and recommendations based on data patterns and trends, automate repetitive tasks, and enhance decision-making processes for both digital marketers and data specialists.
